name: Telly Stratas
text: Terrible experience today. I came to buy an RV that was listed on their website. The salesman came over with an attitude and acted like he didn’t want my business. He was very rude and had no interest in showing me anything. Taking my business to Montgomery. Don’t waste your time!

name: Deb Faith
text: My husband and I have been shopping all over  Al.and Ga. We have  had some pretty bad RV sales people ..But not here. Our sales man MIKE HEWITT was knowable and helpful .Day one I pick the Autumn Ridge had my paper work in 10 min.  Day two went to get our beauty ,it was fresh washed ,Mike and Drew walked us through everything .could have not been easier or faster ...saved big money  helpful staff  loved working with them ..will return.

name: Keith Coleman
text: Stopped by on a Saturday afternoon. All the RVs were locked up and no one came out to offer any help. It's obvious from the inventory, this place is more interested in selling boats over RVs.

name: Shannon Kreider
text: We traveled 3 hours there and 3 hours back 2 weekends in a row to purchase a travel trailer. Everything was great and everyone was super nice until after the sale. At which time we found out they gave us the wrong key and we couldn't lock our trailer. I called several times requesting a new key. No one has called us back. Fortunately, I have a co-worker with a husband that works at Dixie RV and he was able to order us a set of keys. I know where I will be doing business next time. Oh yeah, they also sold our information to a travel resorts website.

name: Madison Reynolds
text: We had a GREAT experience buying from them! The whole process was easy & fast.  Big thanks to Patrick & Kevin. They went above and beyond for us.   We will definitely be back here and will refer friends here.

name: Aaron Warren
text: Great group of guys with the best selection around.  Best prices. Do not buy before you talk to Patrick and his awesome team!

name: Ralph Flynn
text: Awesome place to buy a camper from. There has been a few factory defects on the one I bought but Patrick Ashley has taken care of all the issues  with my camper!  Great costumer service!

name: Tim McLoughlin
text: Very knowledgeable, friendly too, Clayton really knows how to treat people. Great price also

name: James Hodges
text: Blake and Gene are awesome to do business with. When they advertise lowest price in America believe it, what a great experience.

name: Kyle Cooper
text: Terrible Customer Service!! I just bought a brand new travel trailer from them to come serve the community of Mexico Beach where I lost two houses to Hurricane Michael. I’m going to be living in Mexico Beach out of this travel trailer for two months. The salesman “Patrick” has refused to do anything to help me other than tell me to bring it back to him. Well I’m here serving the community. No time to drop everything I’m doing in a catastrophe while he’s sitting in the air conditioning telling me there’s nothing he can do....The air conditioner doesn’t work on this brand new trailer they sold me. They sell garbage products and don’t stand behind what they sell. Buyer beware!!

name: adriana Gordy
text: Very nice people and a very good selection of campers!!!

name: Peter J Williams
text: No Pressure Salesforce with knowledgeable Facts about their inventory. Well stocked RV parts selection. Competitive price for EZ LOADER.

name: Michael s
text: Very friendly,  not pushy like most places

name: Tia Sorrells
text: Really mad at this point I spent $76.25 on a travel trailer door lock I get home n there's no screws so best believe I'll be taking it back asap n making a complaint, if you going to sale something to someone at least don't single them out when they are new at owning rvs campers travel trailers or etc cause I'm gonna tell you one thing I expect my money back and an apology cause wrong is wrong n right is right I'm not a fool don't treat me like one I mean did ya not think we wouldn't notice that the screws weren't with the product once we opened it...LACKS MANNERS N PROFESSIONAL ATTITUDE SI WE WONT BE GOING BACK AFTER I RETURN THIS PRODUCT N GET MY MONEY BACK

name: Don Krzyzanowski’s
text: Family owned with great service 😊

name: Brett Karr
text: I called to get an estimate on a repair for my camper, the guy in service very rudely told me that I didn't buy the camper from them and he wouldn't touch it. I asked why and his response was that he wasn't gonna help out his competition. This would have been money from my pocket to his not warranty work. I work in an automotive service department and can't imagine telling someone that I wouldn't touch their vehicle because they didn't buy from us. Very unprofessional and rude! Wouldn't give them a cent of my money!!

name: Lenny Shelton
text:
Just a Horrible experience! Total lack of any type of professionalism.
The products looked and felt cheap , the young man that was some what helping my wife and I was rude and did not know much about rv's at all. When I ask to see the service department (because before I spend 15 to 20k  on anything I want to know I can get service.) he said. "Well we don't have one here but we can get you fixed don't worry". But what really top off the whole visit was the pushy attitude. I mean my wife and I are new at this we have questions .. we do not need a hard nose kid just trying to make a quick buck. I was in sales 42 years and there is a right way and wrong way to treat customers.

name: josh Man
text: Great prices for Yamaha waverunners

name: Danny Williams
text: Poor customer service. Staff ask as if they. Are to good or busy to waste their time with you.

name: Eva Black
text: I bought a camp here and needed repairs done but the only way to get repairs is to take the camper all the was to a diffent caper place. Not a happy customer. I will not tell anyone about this place.

name: Syd & Tay's Adventures
text: Still waiting 6months after purchase for a spare tire/wheel for our camper.

name: Chad Stancil
text: Not so good service

name: Chauncey Ellis
text: Good Staff

name: Nolan Crowe
text: Parts people are quick

name: Sam Houston
text: Great people that go above and beyond to help!!

name: David Pham
text:
(Translated by Google) It sells important parts for everyone to be captian seafaring and essential and really essential machinery. You will be able to find important items in this area. This area is a bit far and empty, but the road is also very convenient

(Original)
Nơi đây bán các phụ tùng quan trọng để mọi người là captian đi biển máy móc đồ quan trọng và thực sự cần thiết. Bạn sẽ có thể tìm được những món đồ quan trọng pử khu này. Khu này hơi xa và vắng tuy nhiên đường xá cũng rất thuận lợi

name: Jacob Molock

Great service.
Needed parts were in stock.
Price was 20% less then  a marina.

name: Chris Warren
text: This place is the BEST don’t waste time going anywhere else. Very professional and they know what they are doing. Very very helpful.

name: Amanda Bargsley Mitchell
text: Staff does a great job fixing motors. Owner very friendly. They go out of their way to help you and meet your needs.

name: Kenny H
text: These are good people to work with. I had not used this company before and they performed the work I needed in a timely and professional manner for a fair price. I have no reservations recommending this business.

name: lee Johnson
text:
Took my Bullet w/ Motor guide to them today. Took time to look at my problem and fix it when they could have asked me to come back later.
Price was more than reasonable.
Thanks for going out of your way to get me back on the water.
5 STARS !!!!!!!

Good place take your tired and broken trolling motor.

text: Installed trolling motor fast and cheaper than anyone else. Authorized Minnkota dealer and shop. Great price on batteries as well.

resp.text: Thanks Phillip! We strive to provide professional services and advice at a fair price. We really appreciate your business.

text: Very good, thanks

name: Randolphpitt
text: I bought a  can of cola for a dollar, didn't pay attention to anything else

name: Angela Shetlin
text: Great place great work done

name: Angela Shetlin
text: Great people

name: Matt Richardson
text: Never have live bait

name: Broken Arrow
text: We are a veteran-owned/veteran operated 501c3 non-profit in Northeastern Florida and had just bought a Yamaha engine site unseen from Island Bay and drove a long time to go view it-This is probably one of the BEST dealerships that I have ever dealt with in a very long time. Island Bay is very friendly, affordable and have the a very caring crew. We will make it our top priority to ONLY use them for future boat and engine purchases in the future. They are worth the drive and we hope that they will come to Florida to see our PTSD Scuba therapy program and boating/fishing and "ocean therapy" get togethers where we bring combat injured soldiers and families camping and kayaking for suicide prevention and PTSD awareness.

name: Chris Harrison
text: Couldn't ask for a better group of guys to conversate with about buying a new boat...definitely I will be back

name: Wayne Burnette
text: Amazing experience! Very knowledgeable in all areas of the boats. Super helpful and congenial. Will be buying all my boats from them in the future.

name: Jason Collins
text: these guys know what their doing  , even have met me out on the water to fix a few problems that I've had with our boat

name: Corey Lee
text: Nice staff and very easy to work with

name: Samuel Kulman
text: Very Knowledgeable, wanting to help

name: Manuel Baca
text: Sam Strickland responded quickly to my phone call and responded to my boat house the same day. I would strongly recommend Sam Strickland!

name: David Thomas
text: Great place to have your boat and Marine repair work done and parts

name: Kevin Duke
text: Helpful people that make sure you get the right parts for your boat

name: Jesse Gribble
text: He found the problem with my motor was not the motor, but the way it was mounted. No one else found that. Experience helps when you have a unique problem. Great work, and reasonable. Nice people.

name: allen ivey
text: Great people.... friendly .....parts prices as cheap internet .....very knowledgeable

name: Jason Earnest
text: Get me once shame on you, get me twice....... there won’t be a twice....... Guys make sure you get in writing what you want done so you don’t get taken....

name: Peter Hannah
text:
I have a 1983 Mercury 6 Hp that was in storage for over 10 years.  I took it to Strickland because of good word-of-mouth reputation. When I first came to pick up my motor, Mr. Strickland wanted to test it out in my presence to make absolutely certain that it idled well. So, we hung it in his test tank and ran it.  He was not satisfied with the performance, and wanted to keep it a while longer to make it right.

As we were pulling it out of the tank, a fin broke off the shaft housing when it banged against the tank edge.  Strickland's made it right. He not only got the motor running better than I can remember,  but he had a welder make the fin better than new free of charge.

I highly recommend this business for outboard motor repair.

name: Frank L
text: 100% one of the most honest individuals I've ever had the pleasure of speaking with. I'd refer them to anyone that needed work done. Thanks Sam-----------Frank from Tampa

name: William KING
text: Great service and super nice people

name: p-nut Cline
text: Good service

name: Winston Gammon
text: Amazing service and mechanic. Had a problem on the lake and it was fixed within an hour. 10/10 would recommend. Will be using them again.

name: Paul Vidamo
text: Never had any boat service done here but the customer service over the phone is over the top won't find many places to point you in the another business direction to get work done but they are extremely helpful with knowledge of other Marina boat repair in the area thanks for all your help keep up the great work  would definitely get my boat serviced in the future here

name: Kittie Jones Cook
text: Helpful

name: Brian Hatter
text: Did a amazing job today fixing my sons boat. He was prefishing for the collegiate series on lake Eufaula and his water pump stopped working. We called and he was able to get him back on the water in a hour. He did a great job and double checked everything for us. We would definitely recommend.

name: Bryan Gilbert
text: Great place to get work done.  Brett and crew will take great care of you.

name: William Campbell
text: Highly recommend and Reasonable.  Has worked on my boat, 1985 Honda 4-wheeler (which a local Honda dealer messed up), and various gasoline powered lawn equipment.  Give them a call!

name: Richard Warren
text: Excellent boat mechanic

name: Donna Lynn Greene
text: Friendly people to deal with

name: Gene Barnette
text:
I recently contacted TH marine to ask about a screw sleeve for the Yolotek camera pole ,due to mine had broken and these guys are awesome they never fail to come thru for me they got me taken care of .

Thanks guys for your support

Gene Barnette

resp.text: Thank you, Gene! We hope to continue earning your business!

name: Donald Ferguson
text: My Atlas jack plate relay prematurely failed on my Ranger Bahia 240. It would go up, not down. I contacted customer service, gave then a little info and they immediately sent a new relay with the wiring harness attached. I just installed it myself, 20 minutes, and it works as new. Thank you for your help.

resp.text: Thank you for being a T-H Marine customer! If there is any other way we can help, please just let us know!

name: James Johnston
text: Seems like they wanted to make more money they would spend $8 an hour on somebody to answer their phonesIs impossible to get in touch with them

resp.text:
Hi James. Sorry to read that you had some difficulty reaching us by phone. :( Although we are not always able to predict just how many phone representatives we should have available, we are increasing our capacity to answer questions via social media (@thmarineteam) and our Help Page with email contact form (linked below), so please feel free to contact us anytime using those channels. If you can't reach us by phone, please visit us at www.thmarine.com/help -- from there, you can access a variety of FAQs, tips, and a contact form where we can get you directly connected with the right member of our team.

Either way, we'll do our best to provide you a personalized, typed reply, but you can also provide a call-back number and a good time to reach you if a phone call would be better. Sorry again for the trouble in getting through amid the other calls, but we hope you'll take advantage of one of our other options to get started with helping you.

name: Ersi Bice
text:
You guys have made if very difficult to earn my business in the future.  I ordered a tube where i can fit my electrical fish rod tools but to my surprise, the product arrives with no end caps.  All while the product picture has end caps, which is basically false advertisement.  So let me get this straight, your customers are coming to your site to buy an empty tube with no end caps?  I can conveniently drive to home depot and get a random pipe for that.  Or even ask my neighbor.  How about putting it in capital letters on your site  that "the tube doesn't come with end caps."  Then it would be up to the customer to read and do the proper product research.

But wait there's more.  So i was already super irritated at the lack of logic being used on this one but i refrained from writing a bad review.  Instead, I brushed it off, went on the website, and found I can just order these vynil end caps for $2, plus shipping.  Whatever! Right?  It happens!

But my disappointment didn't stop there.  I received the package, opened it and only one cap was inside.  Again, the product page is titled "black vynil caps" and the first picture is a picture of multiple caps.  So once again, misleading a returning customer that already gave you a second chance.  Where is the logic?  I am certain that you have run into this problem before.  Why is it not fixed.  You risk reputational damage for a few extra bucks.

I just don't understand how your number one priority isn't to make life easier for your customers and delighting them at every step of the sales process....  I am stuck between throwing the tube out and looking elsewhere, or just ordering another stupid end cap and paying shipping FOR THE THIRD TIME

resp.text: Hi Ersi. We are very sorry to read about this, but we do want to help you and improve what we're doing, too. Can you please send us this message at thmarine.com/writeus or contact us via Facebook Messenger? That will help us to get a better understanding of what we could do better, along with allowing us to ask some questions about this situation. Sorry again for the trouble, but we hope you'll write us so we can do our best to help.

name: David Waikem
text: I had an issue with a KVD Hydrowave unit, contacted TH Marine and all they asked for was a copy of the receipt. When they received the copy they sent a brand new unit out to me. All done within 10 days, excellent service and now a long term customer for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! We hope to continue earning your business!

name: Parker Mott
text: T-H Marine is a one-stop shop marine for all you needs. My favorite product is the Loc-R-Bar... I travel across the country fishing pro tournaments, and their safety devices are the best out there. I never have to worry. I also love the T-H Marine LED trailer lights... they are more affordable than other LED lights and just as good, if not better in a lot of ways. Much easier to install for sure!! Thanks guys! Your customer service is amazing!!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Parker! We hope to see some pictures of your lights on social media — we love seeing those products in action, doing what they are supposed to.

name: Stephen Richter
text: T-H Marine is a great company with a product selection that keeps growing and growing. Whether you are looking for the (1) niche product or looking to fully customize your boat, they have you covered! To top things off, T-H Marine has great staff and service. The very few times I have needed to speak with them for questions I had, they were 100% in my book!

resp.text: Thank you, Stephen! We are thankful for your business. Tight lines!

name: Jacob A.
text: Good luck trying to reach them on the phone. Day three now and still haven't been able to speak with anyone.

resp.text: Sorry to read of this experience, Jacob, but we do want to help! We do not staff our phone lines over the weekend and we sometimes experience high-volume call times midday during the week, but you can reach us anytime on our website at www.thmarine.com/help -- from there, you can access a variety of FAQs, tips, and a contact form where we can get you directly connected with the right member of our team. You can also contact us via Facebook Messenger to leave us a message. Either way, we'll do our best to provide you a personalized, typed reply, but you can also provide a call-back number and a good time to reach you if a phone call would be better. Sorry again for the trouble in getting through amid the other calls, but we hope you'll take advantage of one of our other options to get started with helping you.

name: Frank Elasavage
text: I've been purchasing from TH Marine now for about a couple years and love their products! I've purchased everything from bow to stern on my bass boat and can tell you first hand,  their products are top notch!! I have everything from the HydroWave, G Force Elminator, Blue Water LED's lighting to an Atlas Jackplate! Their customer service is off the charts when it comes to help as well. If you haven't purchased from TH Marine, I would get give a try! Thet have you covered from bow to stern on all you boating needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Frank, for your continued business!

name: Jamin Gadoury
text: Getting through to this company is a miserable experiece. Getting them to send me a jack plate was an equally miserable experience! Their lack of customer service cost me 4+ weeks on the water! After finding out on the last go around that they hadn't sent the plate a week before hand. I will say they were nice enough to offer for me to pay an additional $300.00 to get my plate over nighted! I am in total disbelief that a company can treat their customers like this! I am praying that their product is more reliable than their service! I am very disappointed in the experience I have had with them. The only reason I gave 2 stars is because the jack plate looks very impressive and I am happy with the product! I pray it never has an issue that I have to contact customer service for!!!!!

name: Bug Tarleton
text: I had a life threatening experience yesterday with a "hot foot" that had no stop bolt on it.The throttle broke and the motor was wide-open throttle (W.O.T.) at 75 mph and I had to shut it off with the kill switch.I called the company to let them know that the stop was missing and that is what hyper-extended the other manufacturer part. I first told them that I wasn't going to sue them I just wanted them to know to fix the bolt so it couldn't be removed just adjusted.They never would let me explain what actually happened. They just kept saying they didn't make that part. It is SAD that someone will have to get killed to resolve this. I was just trying to save a family some grief. I called my dealer and my new part was on the way in ten minutes.That is how you do it, T AND H MARINE.Your products are great but your success has blinded you.

name: James W
text: I sell and install marine electronics and trolling motors.  I have never been able to get anyone to call me back with technical info on a product. I have talked to them numerous times at dealer shows and outdoor shows. They are very friendly and seem to know their products very well. Getting them to return a phone call is impossible for either me or my customers.

resp.text: We are very sorry to read you have had this kind of experience, James. If you would be so inclined, we would appreciate the chance to talk with you about how we can improve. Please write us at thminfo@thmarine.com and direct the message to Derek. Whether we need to improve our support line somehow, provide more resources online, or something else, we aim to do all that we can. Thank you for letting us know about this and thank you for working with T-H Marine products.

name: Jimmy Monk
text: Excellent. Was great talking to Mr Joe. No pressure sales. Excellent service and sales!

name: Bubba Ivey
text: Great guys here. Very accommodating. Build to order.

name: Leigh Bryan
text: Poor customer service. Years of business with this company, very disappointed.

name: jean clingan
text: A great place for fishing boat repair.

name: Donald Harris
text: Good people to deal with.

name: Ronnie Mullen
text: They serviced by boat charged $500 still ran the same. Don't have much to say about them. Would not go back.

name: Cindy Lee
text: Great group of professionals to replace and repair my older model horse trailer..

name: Vini DC
text: I have  mercury 200hp. Started to have cooling problem and idle ( water and air coming out of the pee hole)took the boat to them and all they did was replace my thermostat which was 6 months old. Check my impeller and told me everything was good. Well turn out I had a cylinder full of water because of a broken gasket. I’m no mechanic and I was able fix it myself with a service manual. Their lack of knowledge could’ve cost me a lot

text: Great folks. Great workmandhip

text: Excellent service... They are very knowledgeable and are willing to help you with anything, I went in to purchase an amplifier and they didn't try to talk me into spending more money, they got exactly what I asked for and gave me the help I needed. Great one on one customer service, it was a real pleasure dealing with the team they have. I look forward to doing a lot of business with The Car Stereo Shop!

name: Philip Lerner
text: Once I entered the business I was greeted by a gentleman by the name of Spencer. And then I was greeted by the owner name Steve. Both of these gentlemen were top notch. I would highly recommend these folks for your  Car stereo system. They know their business. And they have great customer service. I would deal with these guys from now on. If I can give them more than 5 stars I would they are phenomenal.

name: DJ XPLICIT
text: Being part of the D.i.y community. These guys always help me with whatever I need. Also very reasonable prices..Thanks guys. Keep up the good work. I'll be back very soon.

name: Ryan McDaniel
text: Great and helpful staff that will help you find what you are looking for and Great prices

name: Jay Shealey
text: Called and asked if they had any dash kits available the guy on the phone told me they had then in stock and that it can be picked up the next day. Well I went by to purchase to the dash kit and a man told me that he was not going to sell the kit to me. Why tell me you have them available but your not going to sell it to me?

name: Bravo Beats
text: Friendly people, great service, and a great selection. I'd definitely continue to do business with those guys.

name: Michael Ware
text: I went in and the guys here really gave me solid advice and man do they have the gear ! Wall to wall car Audio ! I was treated like my business was welcome and they were ready to make my wildest dreams come true ! I came in after having a bad experience elsewhere and needed some ferrules and spade connections to clean up the mess that was made over at the other place and they gave me without charge the few connectors and sent me a link to get set up with a line of credit to get started on my dream build . I was recommended this place by my friends and I see why . Can’t wait to get back in and throw some 💵💵at it !

name: Danny Strong
text: Long time customer always satisfied  Great team

name: Todd Matthews
text: I am very happy with my car upgrade. Jeremy knows what components add most value and Nick did professional installation.

name: Jarquechia White
text: I called about a quote for a new Blutooth system in my car. They were so friendly over the phone! When I went to the shop they were informative about everything and I could really tell that they were trying to get the best price for me. I had good conversation with two of the guys there and they just made the whole experience enjoyable. I am so in love with my new touch screen stereo system with Apple car play! Go check them out I promise you wont be disappointed in their quality and customer service.

name: Jon Paul
text: Go see my boy Jeremy and you can not go wrong...his knowledge and kindness is the best customer service I've seen in years...everybody else is great as well so you can't wrong with this place

name: David Williams
text: Great service I love my new CD player/ radio. I feel like I'm in a concert while listening to music

name: Dan Broadwater
text: Great service , Steve and his installers do excellent work

name: Brooke Myers
text: I’ve been using the Car Stereo Shop personally and professionally for years. Great service, great products and awesome prices. The absolute nicest people, too! If you’ve got a specialty project like a business vehicle you want noticed like a radio station remote vehicle, use these guys! They will blow you away!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and loyalty! It's been awesome working with you personally and with the radio station. Let us know if we can help in any way.

name: Cole McClelland
text: Took my truck down there to get the head unit replaced. Jeremy took good care of me, and it didn’t take too long at all. Great customer service and great prices. 10/10 would recommend again.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and the review! Looking forward to doing business with you and your family again in the future. Let us know if we can help out in any way.

name: Aimee Thrower
text: Jeremy at the car stereo shop is wonderful to work with and focused on meeting all your needs with a sound system!! They do great work and very fast!! Thank you we are definitely going to enjoy the speakers on the SxS!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to leave us a review! It was a pleasure working with y'all. You have an awesome Ranger!

name: Robert Busack
text: Love this place. They know the information about all the products. Great people and great atmosphere. At the end of the day I trust them with my car!

resp.text: It was a pleasure working with you on both your cars! Thanks for the kind words!!!!

name: Lachandra Brooks
text: This is far most the best place to go! Jeremy Reaves will get you right every time! They are very nice, professional, fast, and the prices are reasonable. You won't be disappointed I promise you!!!!🙂🤗 Go see Jeremy Reaves he will get you right with all your needs!!!!

name: Bailey Saggus
text: They always go above and beyond with everything I take to them I never left unsatisfied.

name: kevin kim
text: Team members are very kind and give us detail informations. Highly recommended.

name: Will Ledbetter
text: Great people to work with! Good! Great customer service

name: Theo2976
text: Great people great work just a great place

name: malik clark
text: This place is great. I have taken all three of my cars here. They have great service and great prices and very friendly

name: Ashley Draper
text:
You WILL NOT find a better guy than Jeremy!
He’s so friendly and always ready to help, plus he knowssss his stuff and I never have to worry that I won’t get 100% what I asked for! 😊

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and the review!

name: Its Ya Boys
text: They are the best when it comes down for them to install speakers. The process took long but luckly i am a patient person that waited on the men to finish. Overall I recommend giving it a try.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We never rush work so we can make sure the job is done right the first time. Thank you for your business and if we can help in any way, stop by and let us know.

name: Christopher Foster
text: Fast service and good prices... nice staff and low prices...

name: Davis C
text: The best place to go to get any car stereo products. Great customer service they are extremely helpful. I recommend them 100%.

name: Colby Conway
text: Bought a speaker in February.   The speaker went bad.  Took it back to them and they replaced it under warranty.  Great service with no issues.  Will recommend to everybody.  Left with new speaker on my 4-wheeler.  Very happy and will be spending my money with them and only them.  Thank you guys for the great service and gratitude.  No wonder y’all have made it so far with your business.

text: Best shop in the area! Quality products at a great price and great customer service. Jeremy was a big help and worked with me all the way to the end to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase. Thank you to everyone at The Car Stereo Shop. Keep doing what you’re doing!

I will definitely be back and recommend these guys!

They are the way to go they are straight forward and make sure that you are satisfied with the products they sell and install. I highly recommend them to anyone looking to do some customizing to their vehicle, boats, atvs and more.

I made.the.drive from Columbus to Auburn and it was absolutely worth the drive the service I received . Very seldom get this level of service  anywhere . Ended up being a blown  fuse. Thanks Steve  and Techs , I am  planning on going back for other upgrades.  Extremely  satisfied .  See you guys  soon.

If you have an idea of what you want and really don’t know much, they will point you in the right direction. The sky is the limit with this place as far as what you can do to your ride. I feel as if I have the best sound in Brandon, FL. Very affordable as well.

name: jose Smith
text:
Seriously the best speaker business in the area! They are completely honest and want whats best for you. They are not trying to just get you in and out and make the biggest profit off of you. They also saved me more than half from what jimmy's car stereo was trying to talk me into. 5-star place in my book.

p.s. David is the man! He could honestly sell a penguin an iceberg.

Those guys were great,respectful,and very professional. My car stereo has never had as good a sound as it does now. I had an appointment for an installation. I arrived early. They have a really nice spot to wait. I tell Ya the wait wasint as long as they had said. I plan to do all my future business there. My stereo looks like it came factory. I left cash in my dash it was right where I left it. I am 100% satisfied with my experience with the Car Stereo Shop.
Thanks Guys.

name: Erin Spann
text: These guys were so great, we pulled in from out of town and they fixed are issue with the car stereo.. The got us in and out and even went the extra mile to drop us at a breakfast place while they fixed our system!! We highly recommend these guys!!!

name: Christopher Ceman
text: I've had work done at a couple different Car Stereo shops in the area, and this is the only one that will be getting repeat business. Competitive pricing, quick turnaround times on install, will answer ever question you have about audio equipment, and give you honest answers.

name: Roniegus Lyons
text: Great quality products. Helpful customer service to get you your money worth

name: Roy Crump
text:
The place was excellent! I had some issues with my stereo and they took a look for me. They offered several options as to how to fix the problem, but I ended up just buying a new stereo. It was installed quickly and very professionally and overall they did a fantastic job. Hell, they set the time on the stereo as well as some of the presets.

They are  also helpful if you ever need any fuses. I had to track down a pretty rare fuse for an old motorcycle. They didn't have the fuse but they were nice enough to suggest us several places that could help us find a replacement. I highly recommend them!

name: Bubba Sorenson
text: The guys over here are awesome. They took my truck and got it hooked up and sounding right in like an hour. Nice guys and good bedside manner. I will be coming back here!

name: Bubba Sorenson
text: The guys over here are awesome. They took my truck and got it hooked up and sounding right in like an hour. Nice guys and good bedside manner. I will be coming back here!

name: Phillip James
text: Great shop. The installers are awesome and the salemen really know their stuff. My son Water has had a couple of his cars done there and the special touch from Steve's Car Stereo Shop always make a huge difference. 👍🏾

name: Steve L
text:
I’m really torn about The Car Stereo Shop. On the one hand, Anthony, the sales person who I dealt with, is really nice, helpful, knowledgeable, and wants his customers to be happy. On the other hand, there were so many problems with my install, it just seems like things are really disorganized over there and quality control might be a little lacking.

I went to The Car Stereo Shop because my 2005 car didn’t even have an aux port, and I wanted one. But Anthony then informed me I could get a video head unit which would allow me to use Android Auto like a new car can, and that sounded awesome, so I decided to do that instead of just getting an aux port (I wouldn’t really need the aux port since I’d be able to play music with Bluetooth or USB cord). Also, he suggested a speaker upgrade from factory speakers (without being pushy about it at all), and I realized it would be nice to have non-factory speakers for a change. So I ordered an install of the head unit, speakers, and a new Sirius satellite antenna since the old 2005 one wouldn’t work with the head unit.

Then the problems began. For example:

--When I went to pick up the car after the install, the Sirius satellite antenna had never been installed.
--When i went to pick up the car after the Sirius satellite antenna was installed, the microphone (needed for hands-free phone calls & Android auto commands) no longer worked.
--When I went to pick up the car after the microphone was fixed, I found a small chunk of my dash had been ripped out during the latest repair.
--The Sirius radio kept cutting out, and when I asked them about it they said it was just the trees blocking the signal, but finally I was so frustrated I contacted Sirius and they sent me a replacement antenna, and after replacing the antenna the radio didn’t cut out at all so it turns out I was right.
--Also, there were numerous times when scheduling was difficult or delayed because they were “short a tech.” They always seemed to be “short a tech.”
--Also, the billing system was really disorganized. There were times we’d be looking around for a paper receipt to see how much I had paid them, how much they’d quoted me on price, etc., rather than just looking it up on a computer.

So the whole process of the install had a lot of issues. BUT, now that the install is done, I am really happy with my new stereo system. And I’m grateful to Anthony for all his advice. He made me aware of potential stereo improvements I hadn’t considered (video screen, Android auto, new speakers), without trying to push stuff on me. Also, the shop did a really nice job crafting custom molds for the Tweeters and installing everything so that it looks natural in the car. And Anthony couldn’t have been nicer about all of the issues I was having with the install and making them right. He was genuinely apologetic about everything and worked really hard to get fixes done as soon as possible.

So if you’re looking for a new car stereo, I do think it’s worth visiting The Car Stereo Shop and talking to Anthony. He’s great. Just be aware of the potential issues -- who knows, maybe they’ve improved things there by now.

name: Daryl Bledsoe
text: A good place to get your car stereo and have it installed

name: Jeremy Reaves
text: What more can I say. Honest, reliable, and the quality of work speaks for itself. No reason to go anywhere else. They price match and guarantee labor.

name: Joseph Howard
text: Awesome

name: Clay Peacock
text: I have bought all of my car audio from the car stereo shop. The employees greet me and shake my hand. They answer any questions i have and are very experienced

name: Scott Campbell
text: Took my truck in to install a better stereo. These fellas are fantastic! The sound is fantastic, and you can’t beat the workmanship!

name: jessie bell
text: Gr8 people they'll hook you up got me bangin thanx

name: Roy Crump
text:
The place was excellent! I had some issues with my stereo and they took a look for me. They offered several options as to how to fix the problem, but I ended up just buying a new stereo. It was installed quickly and very professionally and overall they did a fantastic job. Hell, they set the time on the stereo as well as some of the presets.

They are  also helpful if you ever need any fuses. I had to track down a pretty rare fuse for an old motorcycle. They didn't have the fuse but they were nice enough to suggest us several places that could help us find a replacement. I highly recommend them!

text: If you want to be ran around, this is the place to go!

text: These guys are great.  Had an issue with my head unit they installed and they resolved the issue for no charge.

name: Lawrence Padmore
text: Go see Spencer or Jeremy, they will guide you to what you want.

name: Chase Young
text: Went to Mr Steve the owner with a tight budget and wanted good sound. He told me Memphis was having a sale so I was open to try new things. They hooked me up with a box and subs and a used amp but when I hooked it all up it was not sounding right so I went back up there and they found my radio was not supplying the right amount of signal to the amp, I replaced the radio but yet again it was not sounding right so I took it up to the shop and just told them to fix it, 15 minutes later it was exactly as it should have been. Great service and great technicians working there. Defiantly recommend to anyone who needs anything car audio. "TIP": Let them do the install, they know more about it that you and can get it like you want it the first time instead of you doing it and messing it up more. Great all around shop. When I want something else I will defiantly be back to see them!!!

name: Corey Grizzle
text: These guys are great, they will help you even if your not sure what you want and give you options based on what you want to spend.

name: charles floyd
text: THESE GUYS ARE EPICALLY AWESOME!!! THEY KNOW THERE STUFF! my knowledge of high end car audio was about 6 years old and not just one helped me but everyone came out to my car and we talked for like three hours and gave me alot of knowledge and made me feel comfortable. i will say this DONT go here if you wanna be treated as a customer, GO HERE because you wanna be treated like a friend.

name: john david andrus
text: Owner of shop drives company, very easy to work with, I have always taken my work to them, great shop!

name: Arnetta Greer
text: They were very professional... And very fast....

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!

name: Jay Kimsey
text: Worked with Steve and team for many years. Always the best service and prices!!  I live in Georgia but work with Steve in AL. Worth the trip!

name: Greg Hickman (greghickmanDOTcom)
text: Good prices and nice guy that owns it. They seem pretty fair,  honest and good selection of name brands.

name: JD Johnson
text: Great people, great prices,  great service. Call and schedule an appointment because these guys are always busy.

name: Logan Roberts
text: First time I went in there and the guys were pretty helpful and gave me some good advice on the right product. I purchased the product and was told if it did not work for me, I could simply bring it back to return it. So, of course the cheapy, overpriced product did not work, so I brought it back to get my money back. When I walked in, the owner was there and I explained to him that it did not work so I just simply wanted to return it. The owner walks over to me and literally starts yelling at me saying that I am a total and complete idiot, and that I don't know what the hell I'm doing and would not let me return the product. I was being very polite and there was absolutely no reason for him to act that way!! So now I've wasted my money on a product that can no longer be used.I will never give this store my business ever again, and I have no idea why anyone would give their business to such a rude and uncaring store!! STAY AWAY!!!

name: Tonyo Hill
text: This is the best and in my opinon only place to go for any car audio needs you have.Not many businesses will tell you what you DONT NEED to buy from them and take a loss at the benefit of the customer. Everybody there is very knowledgeable and the workmanship is top notch. From spencer helping me piece together a list of equipment, to jeremy and anthony helping me come up with a set up based on how i wanted it to sound, these guys did great work.I got my car back and every thing looks stock. Every thing is hidden and fits like it did before they got it which says alot because they definitely had a LONG list of things to do. They'll  get all my projects from here on out. Appreciate yalls attention to detail and workmanship. The pride in your craft shows.

name: Britt S.
text: A little overpriced for my liking. Small selection of goods. They've got a few quality products, though.

name: Leonard Dunaway
text: Friendly and good work. The only thing negative is not good on following up.

name: Emory Daniel
text: Very helpful had the obscure connector i needed in stock.

name: steve holmes
text: To the store owner Mr. Steve  great salesman and negotiato just a great all around guy.To the guys at  front desk Jeremy & Nate very helpful. tell those guys whats the problem is and they will recognize and recommend what it takes to get the job done.(great guys). To the techs in the back  great guys. I  don't know all of you all names. Just know Kristin I hope iam spelling your name right. I had a great experience at the car stereo shop I got the stereo system  I wanted  its very loud & massive soumd. I would recommend theese guys to any and everyone. "Thanks again thanks  guys!!!"

name: eddie21
text: Good people that , do that do good ,fast, work 💯💯

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Silverback GEEE
text: Been going here for years.... Its 12/22/15, bought a set of speakers on 12/21/15 for $165 and the cones were NOT EVEN CONNECTED to the subs....took them back immediately, they gave me another pair of used subs and even they sounded like trash. After going back a third time too explain this situation, a tech came out to my car, helped me for a brief second, then the owner (steve) immediately comes out and starts shouting in the parking lot about how they don't work on cars in the parking lot... The real issue here is that they did me untested used speakers and lost money supposedly giving me more expensive ones that still didn't work, the owner (steve) thought that I was trying to avoid the install fee which I offered to pay and acted like the definition of the word unprofessional.... I would definitely NOT ever go back to this place again... They are money hungry and care NOT for recurring customers. And Kerry me NOT forget... I even went back inside to try to help him better understand that I would willingly pay the install fee and he told me: "you can pay the install fee or not and we won't help you, and if that makes you feel some type of way then I DONT CARE!!!" What type of shop owner berates a customer in such a manner?

name: Jordan Strickland
text: Good people, great prices, and quality service.

name: Ryan Oldenburg
text: They are way over priced on just about everything other than rcas... you can buy everything online cheaper

resp.text: We hate that you feel that way Ryan. The reason our prices may seem higher than Ebay or other non-authorized online dealers is because we offer a full warranty on our products. We do however price match all authorized online dealers.

name: Brad Myrick
text: I called thinking my engine needed to be rebuilt because of low compression. The gentleman on the phone walked through everything on the engine with me and told my my engine did not need a rebuild and why it didn't. Very professional and knowledgeable. Thank you again for setting my mind and wallet at ease

name: Josh Vinson
text: These are some of the most knowledgeable, honest people in the world. Whether your looking for a used or new part for your boat or boat motor, they most likely have it or they'll find you one. They stand behind the parts they sale and the owner, Mr. David, knows more about outboard motors than any boat motor mechanic I've ever dealt with so if you need a part or just needing a question answered about your outboard, give them a shout. I know they'll be glad to help.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Josh! Mention your Google review next time you're shopping for a part for a special 10% discount!

name: Forward Observer
text: David, and crew are excellent! Great guys to work with. Fix anything on a boat!

name: rendon slade
text: These guys are awesome.

name: Sam Tate
text: The Guy there David is dishonest and not to be trusted do not take your boat there !!!!! Kept my boat for 3 weeks never authorized repairs but have 600.00 plus Bill. Took him to Court the Judge saw things my way will be going back to court for Court Cost see you soon. Already court order my Boat back to me see you real soon in Court again. No one at this place is a Certified Marine Mechanic I learned the hard way thank you Bill at Steal Creek Marine for fixing my Boat right and in a timely manner if you fool with back yard mechanics that's the type service you will receive don't find out the hard way like I did.

name: Bryan Burleson
text: Great customer service and great guys

name: Danny Miller
text: Excellent, great experience and great personal

name: sam weaver
text: Dont let the humble entrance fool you. Friendly, efficient, super fair prices and know their sht!

name: John Houston
text: These guys are liars and crooks!!!  I sent in a request a request on 5/19/18 to Daivd at outboard repair and salvage for him to honor a receipt for a 200 hp Mercury outboard motor. I had problems with it from day one.  They kept it for over a month and still wasn't fixed. I took it to Steel Creek Marine who is a certified Mercury outboard repair dealer.   They told me that it was not a 200 hp motor but a 150 hp. Big difference.  THAT'S FRAUD. He also said it had major problems and need to be rebuilt.  I have a written statement of the inspection.  So I spoke to David of Outboard Repair and Salvage.  He stated he would replace it.  I dropped of my boat to get the new motor exchanged.   I asked him to please have it fixed by the end of the week.  I called on that Friday and he said he was looking for one.  Then I called several times to see if the boat was ready but I got no answer.  I finally got someone to pic up on Friday 6/30/18. TWO WEEKS LATER!! They said David would have to call me back. He called back and left 2 messages. 1 saying he was still looking for a motor. Another saying that he found one and would have it ready by Monday which was 7/2. I have the recorded messages.  I called to check on it and the secretary now says it will be another week.  Unfortunately I have waited and waited and waited.  ITS NOW 7/21.  There seemes no concern in fixing this problem in a timely manner. I have lost time, money, vacation waiting for this problem to be corrected. I have missed 2 fishing rodeos that tickets were naught for including the Dauphin Island Deep Sea Fishing Rodeo. I have paid for not just tickets for the event but also for my brother I have not seen in 3 years way to get here to fish with him and my dad.  They dont seem to care the fraudulently sold me a wrong motor, that wasn't working either, nor trying to fix the problem in an expedient manner.

name: David Bryan
text: They always have what you need !

name: Mel Porter
text: Great and good own prices

resp.text: Thanks, Mel! Let us know if we can be of any more help.

name: David Hosey
text: Great people that go the extra mile to help you

name: Evon Parker
text: The place to go

name: joe clark
text: Poor customer service. I've been lied to for over a month while my boat has been there. I'll never deal with them again

name: Patricia Smith
text: Absolutely loved the park great staff American owned and operated. Very clean well maintained! Beautiful scenery on the Tennessee river....only draw back is the wifi! Other then that it was an amazing place to stay....we were there for 8 months! Thanks to all that made us feel like family

resp.text: Oh how I’m going to miss you, Patty!  You always left us smiling!  Thank you, and Godspeed.

name: Attila Benoit
text: Very nice and friendly place.

name: Lesli Suttner
text: Great campground! Beautiful site on the Tennessee River. Very clean and modern bathrooms. Definitely recommend. Will stay here again when I’m in the area.

resp.text: Lesli, thank you so much!  Safe travels.

name: Cory McCreary
text:
We really enjoyed our two week stay here! Friendly tenants and staff. Quiet at night and spacious, gravel spots. Every site has a fire pit and picnic table. The community areas are great even though they removed the game room due to a fire. Bathrooms and showers are remodeled and clean. The laundry room is in need of an update but there are many  laundromats nearby if needed. Unfortunately, the WiFi is too weak to even connect to. Despite that, we would definitely stay here again.

Just to note, it IS next door to a recycling plant but the noise was not bothersome to us. Also just to be aware, there are factories across the river that sound alarms on Mondays that could be mistaken for emergency alerts but are not.

*** Because the WiFi issue is out of their control, I updated my review to 5 stars instead of 4.

resp.text: Thank you for your generous review.  The laundry room is currently being updated with the addition of more machines.  And yes, we despise the internet issue ourselves.  Unfortunately, we're located in a "non-growth area", so getting service is not possible, or fiscally not viable for our small business.  We're hoping we can get Starlink SOON!

name: Lisa Allred
text: Very impressed with all the improvements done at Jays! So nice!

name: Jessica Parker
text: We stayed here 6 nights and had no internet the entire time. The lady at checkin stated that the company who had contracted to put internet and cable in had reneged on the work. Price per night should reflect lack of amenities stated on website. There is no clubhouse because the main office burned down and they converted the clubhouse into their main office. Neighboring noise from recycling plant during the day was annoying but tolerable. We felt like the price per night should have been between $30-$40 per night compared to other parks we have stayed in. Lake is beautiful and we enjoyed walking along the waters edge.

name: Jim Shrader
text:
We've stayed at Jay Landings twice and were pleasantly surprised by all the updates. Elizabeth, Veronica and the staff are very friendly and were accommodating when we had to change reservations several times due to Covid restrictions.
The campground is clean with amazing views of the Tennessee River. Yes there are lots of full time campers but everyone is respectful and it's quiet at night. And the Sunsets are incredible.
We look forward to going back to one of our Homes away from Home.

name: Clay Baldis
text: Very nice facilities, love having my boat here!

resp.text: Thanks! We love having y’all here!

name: Daniel Lucas
text: Friendly staff, and one of the lower costs in the Huntsville/Decatur area.

name: kennykaren brown
text: We came to Jay Landing on Super Bowl Saturday for a  3 month stay.  From the minute we arrived Valerie took very GOOD care of us.  On Sunday Joel and Elizabeth the owners threw a SUPERBOWL party worthy of Hollywood and   We met all our neighbors. This is a beautiful campground and Marina located right on the Tennessee River.  We have camped all over this USA and this is one of my favorite places.  EVER!!  I would highly recommend you check it out.   We hope to be back.

name: george bush
text: We are moving into the Jay's Landing RV Park for 5 to 6 months while the new house is built.  Jay's Landing is very clean and quiet.  Pool, laundry and right on the water if you have a boat.  Thus far we are very impressed and happy to be bere.

resp.text: Thank you, George. We are striving each day to finalize improvements. We hope all goes well with the process of building a new home. What an exciting time!

name: Daniel Ray
text: Nice cozy place right on the river.  They had a pool, game room, first-come first-serve paddle board, kayaks, paddle boat.  Also a places to swim and fish(license required) in the river.

name: Debra Sue Loyd
text: We love it here. Grounds, facilities and amenities are well maintained.

name: Linda mrsgagrandma@bellsouth.net
text: Never checked iin spoke to them late Friday afternoon and gave 100 electric deposit called them Monday morning early and said plans changed on the job and wouldn't be coming and they said we used all but 4.00  of the deposit for the time we used we never checked in and  was there . Be careful

name: Warner Arthur
text:
we had a great campsite, number 14. Water front and great view. Staff are all great. We did go thru tornado sirens and loud speakers saying to take shelter but I felt there was no place to go. We saw some folks around the bathhouse, but I doubt that would protect much.
The industrial complexes around us were 24/7 noise but inside we did not mind too much.  The paved road into the camp had huge dips and then also speed bumps, which really rocked the RV and the one near the road was so deep we bottomed out the hitch.

name: Linda Gipson
text: Beautiful place to visit for your RV parking or boating family fun

name: Kelvin Tigner
text: Good people and no drama

name: Ruben Moralez
text: Overall this was a nice place to stay, recent upgrades were done to the road and bath houses. The pool was added but like every downside I’m going to mention, you have to pay to get your key pass and be sure not to loose it! The rent is supposed to be set but you’re always charged extra ALWAYS. I ended up paying 100 more every month because I went over my electricity supposedly. Other then paying more every month I’d say it wasn’t a bad stay the management is friendly for the most part I never had any issues with them. The spots are extremely tight and you can pretty much hear everything your neighbor is doing. There are loud noises from the plants around the park especially on the weekends.

resp.text:
Thank you, Ruben, for your reply.  It allows us to provide information to future guests.   I'd like to respond to your "downsides".

Yes, we collect a $20 deposit on the "key pass" to the pool, which is similar to a hotel key to provide safe passageway into the pool for authorized users.  What you failed to mention is that you get that $20 back when you return the key, so you're not out any money.

Secondly, the sites are metered, and tenants are charged .16/kWh for power usage, and one is invoiced anything usage over the $50 allowance.  Anyone is welcomed to monitor their usage by taking note of the meter reading.  It's certainly unfair for a 22' unit to have to pay a higher rent to cover the usage of a 42' unit which has 2 or 3 air conditioner units, therefore, we keep all things even by giving each monthly guest a $50 allowance toward their power.  How they use it is up to the tenant.  You were also here during the summer months when temperatures were extremely high and often record-setting, so yes, you would more than likely have a higher power usage to keep the camper cool.

Thirdly, the site you were on is one of our smaller and cheaper sites.  We have larger sites as well.

Lastly, we are located next to a scrap yard, and they do move scrap around 6 days a week.  Their weekend noise is no different than during the week.  You must have just been off on the weekends to hear it.

And yes, we're continuing to make improvements on the property, including the addition of 21 more sites so we may welcome more guests!

name: Gloria Schulte
text: Nice place. Bathrooms and showers are very clean. Pool is great. Not in great neighborhood but park is gated. Small but you can tell owners try to keep it maintained.

resp.text: Thank you, Gloria. I’d like to clarify. please. The area is safe, it’s just in an industrial area. Safe travels!

name: Carlton Daggett
text: Highly recommend. Friendly staff, Nice pool, Water front Views. No problems with tenants here. I have been staying here for over a month now.

resp.text: Thank you, Carlton!  We are continuing to make improvements, so for you to take the time to post something positive is appreciated!

name: Calista Hans
text: Great customer service! We were met by very friendly Jay Landings greeters as soon as we pulled into the marina who were helpful with all of our questions and getting us unpacked and settled in our boat for a long weekend stay. They also gave us a list of fun things to do and see along the Tennessee River. Bathrooms and facilities were clean and well-lit, and LOTS of great fishing!! We definitely plan on coming back!!

name: Julie Ryan
text:
It's a beautiful places with a lot of recent upgrades. Very nicely recently renovated shower suites, nice pool, beautiful fire pit areas to watch the sunset.

The downsides are that the spots (especially the pullthroughs)are really small and cramped, the road into and through the campground while recently repaved is very narrow, the wifi is terrible, and the bugs are aplenty. We also noticed trash buildup in our sewage receptacle and broken glass all around our site.

Based on older reviews, it appears they are taking steps to really improve the park and we hope that now that they've done some major things they'll take a look at the small things.

We'd also suggest they update their website with correct pricing as the price we were charged was about 25% higher than what their website quotes.

name: Rosemary Swanner
text: We stayed for July 4th holiday. Was a great vacation. The new pool was awesome. And the staff was very nice. Will go back soon.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Rosemary!  We're pleased to hear from you, especially that you enjoyed the pool!

name: Terry Mims
text: Great people. Very easy to deal with.

name: Melissa Flowers
text: I had a great time. If ever in Bama again, I would love to stay here.

resp.text: We would love to welcome your return. Thank you!

name: Loren Gard
text:
Stopped for the night while traveling.  Parked lake front with a great view. When we checked in the guy could not have been nicer. Price was very reasonable.
It was not crowded.

We were offered the free use of kayaks if we wanted.

A great stop over when traveling. Stop short of the 280 space parking lot and have a waterfront wooded lot.

name: David Jones
text:
Beautiful grounds with a peaceful and tranquil setting. Many amenities are close by. The owners are fantastic and treat you like family.

The facilities are spotless and the store is well stocked with boat supplies.

The boat repair service was done right the first time at very reasonable prices.

All in all we love this place and the people.

name: Chris White
text: I stayed here for the week of January 7-12 and it’s a very nice place. The staff is super friendly and helpful. It’s nice and quite plus it’s close to town but you don’t get all of the noise. I had a pretty easy time finding this place and easy to get into I would definitely recommend this place to anyone

name: Debbie L
text: We stayed the Memorial Day weekend here. We drove from Florida. Elizabeth and Joel were amazing hosts. They were extremely helpful and friendly. The park is well maintained. The bathrooms were clean. The price is right and the view was amazing. Definitely will be returning for the 41st Annual Hot Air Balloon Festival and will stay at Jay's Landing and Marina. I already have my reservation made.

name: Sher Keb
text:
Very similar to roughing it by the river with electric, water and sewer.

Regardless of anything (State or personal emergencies), reservations not cancelled 7 days in advance are not refundable where other campgrounds did give us a refund due to a state declared emergency. On May 27, 2018 when “The governors of Alabama, Florida and Mississippi declared a state of emergency in their states as Subtropical Storm Alberto spread north and west.
As for a overall review of Jay’s Landing in Decatur Alabama, see below:

Con’s:
-Interface with management done only by phone. Reservation, check-in & problem resolution.
-400 feet of very pot holed narrow driveway. Many potholes in little bit of asphalt then much more potholes in the more clay than gravel drive. (Very muddy when it rains)
-More long term “campers” in the park then recreational RV campers
-Paper litter, cigarette butts, nut & bolts, metal scraps found on camp sites.
-Bathroom & shower building is far from camping sites
-Sites are close to each other
-No fishing allowed.

Pro’s
- 2 unisex bathrooms & showers were clean
-Site utilities (electric, water & sewer) are convenient. Electric 30 amp circuit showed good connection and grounding.
-Reservation email sent with a site map document with your site.
-Picnic tables at each site.
-Nice river view
'Common area gazebo with a fire pit and a little playground.

Has the makings of a nice RV park… Someday

name: Dannyy Thompson
text: Nice views and good for families

name: millie boyken
text: Fishing was good and camping was good

name: Mike Bafundo
text: It's a nice quite place on the lake. They staff is friendly and very helpful. It's a nice home away from home while working in Huntsville.

name: Carolyn King
text:
A one night stay turned into four days. Would highly recommend this campground to fellow
Good Sam Club Members.  The managers, the Gipson's are so nice and and go out
of their way to make your stay a good one.  The view of Wheeler lake from your site
is beautiful.and so relaxing.
A & C King

name: Suzie Albert
text:
We just spent two days at Jays Landings RV Park, and found it a great place to stay a day or so while traveling.  It was very relaxing watching the boats on the Tennessee River.  The owner and staff were very helpful and made our stay very enjoyable.

Suzie & Darrell

name: Jeff Rastin
text: Growing and improving every year love to see that thanks

resp.text: We are trying!  Thank you for noticing and making a comment!!!  We hope to be complete by late Spring next year.

name: D Vanloh
text: We love Jay Landings Marina.  My wife and I spend a weekend there every summer and the owners are some of the most hospitable and friendly people we've ever met.  Our kids love the game areas they have almost as much as they love the chickens!  We will be back again soon!

name: matt chitwood racing
text: Worst RV campground we been to! We turned around and forfeited our money. But.... it is surrounded by metal scrap yards, if you like that kind of area.

resp.text: I am sorry you did not find us to your standards.

name: April Scott
text: Beautiful environment!

name: Mary Novak
text: Great views, clean restrooms! The owners are wonderful and so helpful.  The views are great and I really loved the fire pit and gazebo.  We will definately stay there again on our way to and from Gulf Shores.

name: Donna Roy
text: I can't say enough good things about Jay's landing and RV park. I've had a wonderful time here. Elizabeth and Joel go out of their way to make you feel welcome. I have already booked my site for next Memorial day weekend.

name: Chris dillbeck
text: Stayed for 2 nights with family.   This is in the middle of an industrial complex and felt like it is in a run down part of town.  Factory noise all the time.   The metal recycling yard is across the road.   Bathrooms are far away and pretty dirty.  Not to far from interstate.  Many long term campers.  Definantly not worth the amount we paid.  We stayed in site 14 on the water.

name: Steve K
text: Easy access to US-72 and nice location, especially if you have a boat and are looking for access to the river or an overnight stop between Atlanta and Memphis. The Wi-Fi seemed fine, and the laundry facilities were clean (although we didn't use them). The only recommendation is that they fill in some of the potholes on the drive in, as it's a little rough.

name: Nancy Brown
text:
Shower area could have been cleaner
Park and view on general was a nice view and peaceful setting.
Staff was very friendly and nice and kid friendly.

resp.text: Please come back!  Yes, our bath house was in a “low standard” condition, but they have undergone renovation and are now stunning!!!

name: Renee Conway
text: We went with all intentions of only staying a week to 10 days and enjoyed the camp site so well that we stayed for a month. Love the owners and employees are all so helpful and care about their property

name: Jose Noway
text: Might as well stay in a crackhouse. This place is just as dirty and has similar amenities. Only difference is the price.

resp.text:
Mr. Stimpson, are you the owner of “The Other Woman”?  I’m not aware of another John/Jon Stimpson.

Can you expound on what’s “dirty”?  If you’re referencing dusty, you are absolutely correct in referencing our previous state. However, we are undergoing major improvements and paving, which you wouldn’t know about since you haven’t been on the property nor a tenant in a year or so.

If this isn’t the same Mr. Stimpson, then please accept my apology, and will you further explain?

name: Faye Holt
text: Sun set at Jay's landing

name: Dustin Pannell
text: Good place nice ppl working nights very respectful... they tryed not doing thing around my camper while I was sleeping waited for me to get up and go to work first!!!!!

name: Thomas Schmelzle
text: Was a decent place to stay for a night.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Ronald Wojtylko
text: Tight RV spaces, lousy internet.  Worst thing nay be that it is right next to SA recycling so at 6 am, the noise level gets quite high.  Place is a construction worker cash grab.

resp.text: Yes; some spaces are tight, but not all.  Yes, there is a recycling plant next door, and there are times when it is very noisy.  It makes me sad that you say we are a "construction worker cash grab".  We are in business to provide a nice place for "construction worker(s)", and when I have to turn someone down because we are full due to all of the work in the area, we feel badly that we cannot provide a safe environment for such wonderful tenants.  You haven't been here in awhile.  Please come back.  We are in the middle of major property improvements, and we'd like to think that you'd enjoy your next stay.

name: chris corso
text: We stayed for a night coming home from vacation and it was wonderful.  The facilities were very clean and the owners (who took over a few years back) keep the place ship shape and very pleasant.  This rv park/marina is surrounded by a lot of industry  but, this did not keep us from enjoying ourselves in the time we were there.  We had a great time checking out the giant old boats, chickens, playing basketball, and playing with the giant chess set and jenga.  This is not a traditional rv park with wooded surroundings, but we thought it was just great, and if we had brought our boat or fishing poles, we would have loved it even more as it is surrounded on 2 sides by water.  Recommend.

name: Trish Juaire
text: Nice place. Clean and respectable

name: Spencer Campbell
text: Come up one day and got a great offer

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Melissa Durgin
text: Owners are very nice. Close to everything.

name: Jon Stimpson
text: Very dirty and spartan. Expensive considering the condition.

resp.text: You should revisit to see the improvements.

name: Charles Dollar
text: Yea,live in a marina,my kinda place

resp.text: Thanks, Charles!  It's coming along with more to come!

name: Brandon Chase
text: Rates high compared to other rv parks close by.

name: john shallenberger
text: Nice place , nice people

name: junk can
text: Having been involved in recreational boating or commercial shipping nearly my whole life of almost 50 years, I can eagerly attest that Nelson Boatyard is a bright spot in the South for commercial and recreational boaters to service their vessels!  The very affordable rates make the location a win to begin with.  The massive capacity of this large and expanding boatyard is another positive, though they graciously made room for me even in the midst of the fallout of Hurricane Sally .  However, perhaps the best aspect of the facility are the brilliant array of professionals associated with it who are able to attend to any matter that one might face.  Though I intended to perform all the work on my boat, I was delighted to find both excellent, generous guidance and reliable, experienced service providers to attend to all my needs that were beyond my own capacity.  I suppose that is to be expected from a business operated by four generations of one family!   I will be gladly returning from Pensacola for routine maintenance every two years!

name: John Lanier
text: Awesome

name: Matt White
text: Very nice and fair people! Great Price for good work!

resp.text: Thanks!
